MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 Postcode area of Dalkeith,  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.21PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our underground cable network near Shell Garage. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.45AM on 25th March 2021.
